languages.text: И после смерти сенешаля противоречивые слухи о его жизни продолжали будоражить умы людей. По словам безымянных очевидцев, явившись на Даргонус, Абеляр немедленно собрал все свое семейство за столом для праздника. Вино на том пиру было столь же отравлено, как и разум самого Абеляра был отравлен безумием. С той поры почтенный сенешаль не покидал праздничный зал, готовый бесконечно любоваться своим любимым семейством, которое уже никто не в силах был у него отобрать. "Никто больше вам не навредит" — повторял он, умиленно прикладывая распухшие руки к покрытым язвами губам, и мертвецы слабым хрипом согласно вторили ему.

Even after the Seneschal's death, conflicting rumours about his life continued to haunt people's imaginations. According to unnamed witnesses, upon arriving on Dargonus, Abelard immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at that feast was as poisoned as his own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined instead to look over his beloved family forever. Thenceforth, nobody would ever take them from him. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a twisted mantra as he caressed his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.
languages.original_text: И после смерти сенешаля противоречивые слухи о его жизни продолжали будоражить умы людей. По словам безымянных очевидцев, явившись на Даргонус, Абеляр немедленно собрал все свое семейство за столом для праздника. Вино на том пиру было столь же отравлено, как и разум самого Абеляра был отравлен безумием. С той поры почтенный сенешаль не покидал праздничный зал, готовый бесконечно любоваться своим любимым семейством, которое уже никто не в силах был у него отобрать. "Никто больше вам не навредит" — повторял он, умиленно прикладывая распухшие руки к покрытым язвами губам, и мертвецы слабым хрипом согласно вторили ему.

traits.locale_text: Even after the Seneschal's death, conflicting rumours of his life continued to agitate people's minds. According to unnamed witnesses, upon arriving on Dargonus, Abelard immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

After arriving on Dargonus, he immediately started to assemble all of his family for a celebratory dinner. The vine on that feast was as poisoned, as Abelard's mind was poisoned with madness. From this moment honourable Seneschal never left the festive hall, ready to look over his favourite family forever. No one was able to ever take them from him. "No one will harm you anymore," he stuttered, repeating the words, and touching ulcer-ridden lips with his swollen hands, and the dead faintly echoed him.

Even after the Seneschal's death, conflicting rumours about his life continued to haunt people's imaginations. According to unnamed witnesses, upon arriving on Dargonus, Abelard immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at that feast was as poisoned as his own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined instead to look over his beloved family forever. Thenceforth, nobody would ever take them from him. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a twisted mantra as he caressed his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

languages.text: 即便是在阿贝拉德死后，人们对他的生平依然各执一词，充满了八卦的热情。据某位匿名的目击者声称，阿贝拉德回到达戈努斯之后，便立即召集他的家人举行庆祝晚宴。然而，宴会上的美酒却掺入了致命的剧毒，正如他的心灵一样。尊敬的总领再也不必离开这个礼堂了，他将会留在这里，永远照看他心爱的家人。从此往后，再也没人能从他身边夺走他的家人了。“再也没有人能伤害你们了。”他一边用肿胀的双手抚摸着溃烂的嘴唇，一边像念着邪咒一样，不断喃喃自语着这句话。死者的声音隐隐地附和着他。
languages.original_text: Even after the Seneschal's death, conflicting rumours about his life continued to haunt people's imaginations. According to unnamed witnesses, upon arriving on Dargonus, Abelard immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at that feast was as poisoned as his own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined instead to look over his beloved family forever. Thenceforth, nobody would ever take them from him. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a twisted mantra as he caressed his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: 即便是在阿贝拉德死后，人们对他的生平依然各执一词，充满了八卦的热情。据某位匿名的目击者声称，阿贝拉德回到达戈努斯之后，便立即召集他的家人举行庆祝晚宴。然而，宴会上的美酒却掺入了致命的剧毒，正如他的心灵一样。尊敬的总领再也不必离开这个礼堂了，他将会留在这里，永远照看他心爱的家人。从此往后，再也没人能从他身边夺走他的家人了。“再也没有人能伤害你们了。”他一边用肿胀的双手抚摸着溃烂的嘴唇，一边像念着邪咒一样，不断喃喃自语着这句话。死者的声音隐隐地附和着他。

languages.text: Selbst nach dem Tod des Truchsess ließen widersprüchliche Gerüchte über sein Leben der Fantasie der Leute freien Lauf. Einem namenlosen Zeugen zufolge versammelte Abelard seine Familie gleich nach seiner Ankunft auf Dargonus zu einem großen Festmahl. Der gereichte Wein war allerdings ebenso vergiftet wie sein Verstand. Der ehrenwerte Truchsess würde den Festsaal nie wieder verlassen müssen und war dazu bestimmt, für immer über seine geliebte Familie zu wachen. Niemand würde sie ihm mehr wegnehmen können. "Jetzt kann Euch niemand mehr wehtun", murmelte er. Er wiederholte die Worte wie ein Mantra, während er sich mit geschwollenen Händen über die Blasen auf den Lippen strich. Die Toten antworteten nicht.
languages.original_text: Even after the Seneschal's death, conflicting rumours about his life continued to haunt people's imaginations. According to unnamed witnesses, upon arriving on Dargonus, Abelard immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at that feast was as poisoned as his own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined instead to look over his beloved family forever. Thenceforth, nobody would ever take them from him. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a twisted mantra as he caressed his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: Selbst nach dem Tod des Truchsess ließen widersprüchliche Gerüchte über sein Leben der Fantasie der Leute freien Lauf. Einem namenlosen Zeugen zufolge versammelte Abelard seine Familie gleich nach seiner Ankunft auf Dargonus zu einem großen Festmahl. Der gereichte Wein war allerdings ebenso vergiftet wie sein Verstand. Der ehrenwerte Truchsess würde den Festsaal nie wieder verlassen müssen und war dazu bestimmt, für immer über seine geliebte Familie zu wachen. Niemand würde sie ihm mehr wegnehmen können. "Jetzt kann Euch niemand mehr wehtun", murmelte er. Er wiederholte die Worte wie ein Mantra, während er sich mit geschwollenen Händen über die Blasen auf den Lippen strich. Die Toten antworteten nicht.

languages.text: Malgré la mort du sénéchal, des rumeurs contradictoires sur sa vie continuaient de hanter les esprits. Selon des témoins anonymes, en arrivant sur Dargonus, Abélard réunit immédiatement sa famille pour un dîner de célébration. Le vin qui fut servi pendant le festin était aussi empoisonné que son propre esprit. L'honorable sénéchal ne quitta plus jamais la salle de fête, destiné à veiller pour toujours sur sa famille adorée. Ainsi, personne ne pourrait la lui enlever. « Vous n’avez plus rien à craindre, » répétait-il comme un mantra tout en caressant ses lèvres couvertes d'ulcères de ses doigts enflés, et un faible gémissement s’élevait des morts comme pour lui répondre.
languages.original_text: Even after the Seneschal's death, conflicting rumours about his life continued to haunt people's imaginations. According to unnamed witnesses, upon arriving on Dargonus, Abelard immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at that feast was as poisoned as his own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined instead to look over his beloved family forever. Thenceforth, nobody would ever take them from him. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a twisted mantra as he caressed his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: Malgré la mort du sénéchal, des rumeurs contradictoires sur sa vie continuaient de hanter les esprits. Selon des témoins anonymes, en arrivant sur Dargonus, Abélard réunit immédiatement sa famille pour un dîner de célébration. Le vin qui fut servi pendant le festin était aussi empoisonné que son propre esprit. L'honorable sénéchal ne quitta plus jamais la salle de fête, destiné à veiller pour toujours sur sa famille adorée. Ainsi, personne ne pourrait la lui enlever. « Vous n’avez plus rien à craindre, » répétait-il comme un mantra tout en caressant ses lèvres couvertes d'ulcères de ses doigts enflés, et un faible gémissement s’élevait des morts comme pour lui répondre.

languages.text: Tras la muerte del Senescal, diversos rumores sobre su vida siguieron alimentando la imaginación de la gente. Según testigos anónimos, nada más llegar a Dargonus, Abelard reunió de inmediato a su familia para una cena de celebración. El vino del festín estaba tan envenenado como la mente del propio Abelard. El honorable Senescal ya nunca tendría que abandonar aquel salón, destinado a cuidar de su amada familia para siempre. Ya nadie iba a arrebatárselos. «Ahora nadie puede haceros daño», murmuraba una y otra vez en un mantra retorcido mientras se acariciaba los labios cubiertos de úlceras con sus manos hinchadas, y los muertos repetían débilmente sus palabras.
languages.original_text: Even after the Seneschal's death, conflicting rumours about his life continued to haunt people's imaginations. According to unnamed witnesses, upon arriving on Dargonus, Abelard immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at that feast was as poisoned as his own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined instead to look over his beloved family forever. Thenceforth, nobody would ever take them from him. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a twisted mantra as he caressed his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

Según testigos anónimos, nada más llegar a Dargonus, Abelard reunió de inmediato a su familia para una cena de celebración. El vino del festín estaba tan envenenado como la mente del propio Abelard. El honorable Senescal ya nunca tendría que abandonar aquel salón, destinado a cuidar de su amada familia para siempre. Ya nadie iba a arrebatárselos. «Ahora nadie puede haceros daño», murmuraba una y otra vez en un mantra retorcido mientras se acariciaba los labios cubiertos de úlceras con sus manos hinchadas, y los muertos repetían débilmente sus palabras.

languages.text: ダルゴナスに到着すると、彼はすぐに家族を集めて祝宴を開いた。その晩餐会のワインは、アベラルド自身の心と同じように毒されていた。名誉ある家令長はもう二度と祝宴の場を離れることはなく、永遠に愛する家族を見守る運命にあった。「もう誰もあなたを傷つけることはできない」と彼は呟き、腫れた手で潰瘍だらけの唇を撫でながら、病んだマントラのようにその言葉を繰り返した。
languages.original_text: Upon arriving on Dargonus, he immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at the feast was as poisoned as Abelard's own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined to look over his beloved family forever. No one was going to take them from him now. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a sick mantra while caressing his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスに到着すると、彼はすぐに家族を集めて祝宴を開いた。その晩餐会のワインは、アベラルド自身の心と同じように毒されていた。名誉ある家令長はもう二度と祝宴の場を離れることはなく、永遠に愛する家族を見守る運命にあった。「もう誰もあなたを傷つけることはできない」と彼は呟き、腫れた手で潰瘍だらけの唇を撫でながら、病んだマントラのようにその言葉を繰り返した。

languages.text: Seneşal'in ölümünden sonra dahi hayatıyla ilgili çelişkili söylentiler, insanların zihnini meşgul etmeye devam etti. İsimsiz tanıklarına ifadesine göre Abelard, Dargonus'a varır varmaz bir kutlama yemeğiyle ailesini topladı. Ziyafette servis edilen şarap da onun zihni gibi zehirliydi. Onurlu Seneşal; ziyafet salonundan asla ayrılmak zorunda kalmayacak, aksine değerli ailesini sonsuza dek izleyebilecekti. Artık kimse onları ondan alamayacaktı. Ülser kaplı dudaklarını kabarmış elleriyle okşarken "Artık kimse size zarar veremez." diye mırıldanıyor, kelimeleri hastalıklı bir düstur gibi sürekli tekrar ediyordu. Sözleri, ölülerde hafifçe yankı buluyordu.
languages.original_text: Even after the Seneschal's death, conflicting rumours about his life continued to haunt people's imaginations. According to unnamed witnesses, upon arriving on Dargonus, Abelard immediately assembled his family for a celebratory dinner. The wine at that feast was as poisoned as his own mind. The honourable Seneschal would never have to leave the festive hall again, destined instead to look over his beloved family forever. Thenceforth, nobody would ever take them from him. "No one can hurt you now," he muttered, repeating the words like a twisted mantra as he caressed his ulcer-ridden lips with swollen hands, the dead faintly echoing him.
